name: Savior of the Ocean!
description:
Savior of the Ocean! is a minigame where all you have to do is move the bucket by just moving the mouse right and left and touch the trash that will fall from the sky!

If you let the trash enter the ocean you will lose!

Also sometimes fish will spawn, and if you touch them with the bucket you will lose, you have to let them go in the ocean!

In order to win you have to last 100 seconds!

Enjoy and comment if you have won or not ;)
